title: Drawing, "Sarcophagus for the Relic", ca. 1825
medium:
Pen and brown ink, watercolor, over graphite
Support: white laid paper
inscribed: at lower margin, in pen and brown ink: Altezza e Larghezza del Cavo Sotto L'Altare
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Scale: in pen and brown ink, lower center, in palmi quattro Romani

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sarcophagus for the Relic", ca. 1825.
ca. 1825. Pen and brown ink, watercolor, over graphite
